12.18.20  3:16 pm   what is your new song about?

      or is it a surprise..?
12.18.20  3:02 pm   who are your favorite music artists

12.18.20  2:29 pm   Every time I go to write a song anymore, it sounds the same as something I've already done. It feels like I've lost the ability to make anything genuinely new and/or interesting. I have begun to bore myself artistically. How do I snap out of it?
12.18.20  2:01 pm   What do you think is a good way to stop procrastinating, or at least make it happen less?
12.18.20  1:16 pm   How would you describe your music
12.18.20  1:01 pm   When did you get into music, and how? (School, friend recommendation, common interest, etc.)
12.18.20  12:28 pm   does animation take longer than writing a narritive?

12.18.20  12:18 pm   hey bill, I find that when i want to write music I don't have any idea's then when one good idea graces my mind I can't continue it past one verse. Do you ever have the same problem, or know any ways to fix it? its really annoying.

12.18.20  4:45 am   Not a question Bill but the outro to Mount St. Helens is incredibly awesome to listen to. One of the best outros of all time In my opinion

12.18.20  3:43 am   i don't have a question but i have been lurking around your website and i think you're super brilliant. wait, never mind i have a question now. How long did it take you to write "and the day goes on" ? that is a very good song.

     Is there a deeper meaning?

12.18.20  2:11 am   Were the songs "And the day goes on" and "i wanna be a movie star" supposed to feel emotional?
12.18.20  1:45 am   How hard is it to learn 3D animation

12.18.20  12:36 am   i keep having ideas when it's hard to write them down (shower etc.) and if i do go to write the idea down i usually forget most of the details. and if i deliberately put myself into a situation where i can easily write things down (usually by having my ideas document open or by using an audio recorder), then i can't have ideas. it feels like it's only possible for me to either have ideas or remember them, but not both.
12.17.20  11:40 pm   Any estimated date for Next Video? Maybe a Year, what time of the year (Early, Mid, Late), a season, month, exact date? Something? Sorry was just curious :)

12.17.20  12:45 pm    is "355. 4.2.12 dream idea" from https://billwurtz.com/reality/201605260707.mp4 the and the day goes on song?

12.17.20  12:36 pm   I remember you saying that music theory is made up, and when I  read that I was like "huh. That's true." Since that thought was kind of in my brain I thought of it later too with something else. I did a writing assignment at school and got it back today with the teachers comments. It was kind of frustrating though, cause some of their critiques were things that I did on purpose.

     I think the rules of grammar are made up too, like someone just decided that there was a right way of writing things down. But sometimes the "correct" way of writing it didn't sound right to me or didn't have the same effect. I don't know where I was going with this
